Define Documentation

#define GEOXML_PARAMETERS ( seq   )     ((GeoXmlParameters*)(seq))

Cast a GeoXmlSequence to a GeoXmlParameters.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct geoxml_parameters GeoXmlParameters

The GeoXmlParameters struct contains private data only, and should be accessed using the functions below.

Function Documentation

GeoXmlParameter* geoxml_parameters_append_parameter ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters,
enum GEOXML_PARAMETERTYPE  type 
)

Create a new parameter and append it to parameters.

If parameters is a from a group parameter and it has more than one instance, then NULL is returned

If parameters is NULL returns NULL.

void geoxml_parameters_set_exclusive ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters,
GeoXmlParameter *  parameter 
)

Set this parameters to be an exclusive group and parameter to be its exclusive parameter by default.

If parameter is NULL then you want to use the group in non-exclusive mode

If parameters is NULL nothing is done.

See also:
geoxml_parameters_get_exclusive geoxml_parameters_set_selected

GeoXmlParameter* geoxml_parameters_get_exclusive ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

If parameters is NULL returns FALSE.

void geoxml_parameters_set_selected ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters,
GeoXmlParameter *  parameter 
)

If parameters is a exclusive group (aka has a non-NULL exclusive parameter set) then select parameter to be current derised for use parameter; otherwise, nothing is done.

If parameters is NULL nothing is done.

GeoXmlParameter* geoxml_parameters_get_selected ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

If parameters is a exclusive group (aka has a non-NULL exclusive parameter set) then select parameter to be current derised for use parameter; otherwise, returns NULL.

If parameters is NULL returns NULL.

GeoXmlSequence* geoxml_parameters_get_first_parameter ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

Get the first paramater of program.

If parameters is NULL returns NULL.

int geoxml_parameters_get_parameter ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters,
GeoXmlSequence **  parameter,
gulong  index 
)

Get the parameter at index.

glong geoxml_parameters_get_number ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

Get the number of parameters that parameters has.

If parameters is NULL returns -1.

gboolean geoxml_parameters_get_is_in_group ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

Return TRUE if parameters is part of a group.

If parameters is NULL returns FALSE.

See also:
geoxml_parameters_get_group

GeoXmlParameterGroup* geoxml_parameters_get_group ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters  ) 

If parameters is in a group, return this group; otherwise, returns NULL.

If parameters is NULL returns NULL.

See also:
geoxml_parameters_get_is_in_group

void geoxml_parameters_reset ( GeoXmlParameters *  parameters,
gboolean  recursive 
)

Reset parameters' values and default values.

If recursive is true also do it for group (recursively)
